projects.title: Roku Weather App
projects.description: A comprehensive weather application for Roku devices with 7-day forecasts, interactive maps, and personalized weather alerts.

projects.title: Android Task Manager
projects.description: Feature-rich task management app for Android with offline sync, collaborative features, and intuitive material design interface.

projects.title: Roku Streaming Platform
projects.description: Custom streaming platform for Roku with content management, user authentication, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Android Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Health and fitness tracking application with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress visualization.

projects.title: Roku Gaming Channel
projects.description: Interactive gaming channel for Roku devices featuring casual games with leaderboards and achievements.

projects.title: Android E-commerce App
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce application with secure payments, product recommendations, and order tracking.
